channel.title: The Road to the Quest Cape [COMPLETE!]
channel.description:
I had a random urge to start questing again! So here I am, so you can follow me along my path.
I have no intentions of getting a Quest cape (yet :P) but I plan to complete [b]all quests that are available to me, with my current skills.[/b] I will not level any stats (besides from quest rewards) until I have finished this goal.
[b]Edit (October 3rd):[/b] I've started this thread back up again, [u]with the intention of getting a Quest cape[/u]! So, lets get started!
[u][b]Stats I need for quest cape [My level/Required]:[/b][/u] NONE (Completed 3/27/2012)
[u][b]Total quests I haven't completed:[/b][/u] 0
[u][b]Quest points:[/b][/u] 331 [u][b]Progress:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Wednesday, March 23 [list] [li]Back to my Roots[/li] [li]Cold War[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Thursday, March 24 [list] [li]Darkness of Hallowvale[/li] [li]Elemental Workshop III[/li] [li]Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Monday, October 3 [list] [li]Fairy Tale III: Battle at Orks Rift[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Tuesday, October 4 [list] [li]Curse of Arrav[/li] [li]Temple at Senntisten[/li] [li]61 Summoning from TaS rewards[/li] [li]TokTz-Ket-Dill[/li] [li]Rag and Bone Man[/li] [li]Fur 'n' Seek[/li] [li]74 Crafting[/li] [li]74 Smithing (A Clockwork Syringe req)[/li] [li]Salt in the Wound[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Wednesday, October 5 [list] [li]The Void Stares Back[/li] [li]62 Summoning from TVSB rewards[/li] [li]76 Crafting (Mystery of the Mahjarrat req)[/li] [li]Enakhra's Lament[/li] [li]A Tail of Two Cats [b]300 quest point milestone! Can get the Helmet of Trials![/b][/li] [/list][/li] [li]Thursday, October 6 [list] [li]Within the Light[/li] [li]As a First Resort...[/li] [li]Grim Tales[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Friday, October 7 [list] [li]Legacy of Seergaze[/li] [li]Haunted Mine[/li] [li]Hunt for Red Raktuber[/li] [li]67 Slayer (Branches of Darkmeyer req)[/li] [li]72 Agility from Falador Hard Tasks lamp[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Saturday, October 8 [list] [li]The Branches of Darkmeyer[/li] [li]65 Summoning (From Branches of Darkmeyer got 64, then trained to 65. A Clockwork Syringe req) [/li] [li]A Clockwork Syringe[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Sunday-Tuesday, October 8-11 [list] [li]Busy getting 99 Construction[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Wednesday, October 12 [list] [li]Tai Bwo Wannai Trio[/li] [li]Dealing with Scabaras[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Thursday, October 13 [list] [li]Blood Runs Deep[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Wednesday, November 2 [list] [li]Nomad's Reqiem[/li] [/list][/li][/ul]
[hr] 2012 [hr] [ul][li]Thursday, January 12 [list] [li]The Firemaker's Curse[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Thursday, March 22 [list] [li]One Piercing Note[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Monday, March 26 [list] [li]77 Agility (Ritual of the Mahjarrat req)[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Tuesday, March 27 [list] [li]Ritual of the Mahjarrat[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Sunday, April 8 [list] [li]Let Them Eat Pie[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Monday, April 9 [list] [li]Ritual of the Mahjarrat[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Monday, April 9 [list] [li]Elder Kiln[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Tuesday, April 10 [list] [li]Do No Evil[/li] [li][size=22pt][b]Quest Cape acquired![/b][/size][/li] [/list][/li][/ul]

item.title: The Road to the Quest Cape [COMPLETE!]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:89, topic:387739”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=483534.msg3970502#msg3970502 date=1334097576]
Thanks I’m pretty sure it’s the rarest cape in the game (except maybe the new one that looks like stacked B2 bombers, but who knows)


[/quote]
most likely not the rarest (rc, slayer perhaps?)[/quote]Nah, those aren’t that rare. Maybe not as rare as the untrimmed HP cape tho.

RuneScape Wiki

Skill mastery

Skill mastery is achieved by reaching level 99 in any skill. Level 99 is achieved by reaching 13,034,431 experience points in a skill with the exception being Invention (36,073,511 experience to reach skill mastery). Level 99 is the maximum level in...

RC only has a few thousand less than construction (which I also have ;D), and you see people flaunting it pretty often still

Read full topic

item.title: The Road to the Quest Cape [COMPLETE!]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Not terrible. Ice barrage made the chimp-ice part a piece of cake. (c wut i did thar)

The bosses were a tad more difficult than I expected, the main issue is the second one. I tried to melee it and had to tele out. You need to range it for sure. Having teleports is VERY handy around the desert, especially fairy rings.

Read full topic
